Class ReservationServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.example.library.service.ReservationServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReservationService
public class ReservationServiceImpl extends Object implements ReservationService
Implementation of ReservationService. Manages item reservations with queue functionality.

    • fulfillNextReservation

      public Reservation fulfillNextReservation(int itemId)
      Description copied from interface: ReservationService
      Fulfills a reservation when the item becomes available. This should be called when an item is returned.
      Specified by:
      fulfillNextReservation in interface ReservationService
      Parameters:
      itemId - the ID of the returned item
      Returns:
      the fulfilled reservation, or null if no active reservations

    • expireOldReservations

      public int expireOldReservations()
      Description copied from interface: ReservationService
      Expires old reservations that are past their expiry date. Should be run periodically (e.g., daily).
      Specified by:
      expireOldReservations in interface ReservationService
      Returns:
      count of expired reservations

    • getQueuePosition

      public int getQueuePosition(int reservationId)
      Description copied from interface: ReservationService
      Gets the position of a reservation in the queue for an item.
      Specified by:
      getQueuePosition in interface ReservationService
      Parameters:
      reservationId - the ID of the reservation
      Returns:
      the position (1-based), or -1 if not found or not active

    • hasActiveReservation

      public boolean hasActiveReservation(int userId, int itemId)
      Description copied from interface: ReservationService
      Checks if a user has an active reservation for an item.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      itemId - the ID of the item
